profile.heading: Profile
profile.description: My name is Alonso, I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with experience in creating dynamic and responsive web applications. I enjoy solving complex problems and continuously learning new technologies to enhance my skills. I am committed to delivering high-quality code and collaborating effectively with teams to achieve project goals. Feel free to reach out for any opportunities or collaborations.

dark_forest.description: Dark Forest is a 3D adventure game developed with Unity. Explore a mysterious world filled with challenges and secrets as you battle dark creatures.
